short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds functionality to CodeTree

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This adds a small dropdown at the bottom of the board page allowing all columns to be show/hidden.  It uses local storage to persist this data across page reloads.
